Package com.toy_store.java.financial

Class Currency

java.lang.Object
com.toy_store.java.financial.Currency
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.io.Serializable
public class Currency
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable
Represents a currency. Currencies are identified by their ISO 4217 currency codes.

The class is designed so that all Currency instances are saved in a Map, so there are no duplicates. Therefore, there is no public constructor. A new instance can be obtained by using the createInstance(String, String, double) method or you can get an existing instance by using the getInstanceByName(String) method or getInstanceBySymbol(String)

See Also:
